description: This file contains functions for rendering input forms in a Streamlit app, including a profile form and a goal editor, to gather and update user financial data and goals.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] profile_form(profile: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Renders a form to input and update user profile financial data such as income, expenses, city, risk tolerance, savings, debts, and savings rate target.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] goal_editor(goal: Dict[str, Any] | None = None, key: str = "goal_form")
methods.description: Renders a form to input and update a financial goal, including goal name, type, target amount, current amount, horizon in years, and priority.

ctags.name: goal_editor
ctags.pattern: /^def goal_editor(goal: Dict[str, Any] | None = None, key: str = "goal_form") -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (goal: Dict[str, Any] | None = None, key: str = "goal_form")
